text: this video assumes you already know the
following items displayed on your
screen if you're not ready to watch here
are some places you can learn
more welcome in this video we will show
you how kosere Studio makes it easy to
learn develop deploy and debug map ruce
jobs for Hadoop on Amazon elastic map
ruce using data stored on S3 kosere
studio is a plugin for the Eclipse IDE
that runs on Windows m and Linux desktop
systems it provides a graphical
environment that supports the complete
life cycle for developing for Amazon
elastic map reduce the Hadoop
development life cycle includes
prototyping and developing testing and
debugging and deploying and optimizing
Hadoop jobs with kosere Studio
developers have a graphical environment
to learn Hadoop develop custom analytic
algorithms and create meaningful data
sets for their business from large
amounts of structured and unstructured
data stored on Amazon S3 to access
amalon Amazon elastic map produce in S3
you enter your Amazon account access key
and secret key this enables you to use
both EMR and S3 when you need access to
your data on S3 or want to deploy your
jobs to a new or existing job flow on
EMR first let's take a look at how
kosere Studio helps you better
understand how your Java code will
execute in a map reduce pipeline it
provides a workflow interface to display
the results of each stage of a map
produced job it gives you the ability to
use use either a sample local data set
or a sample taken directly from your
full data stored on S3 this helps you
work out the Kinks in your initial code
without the turnaround time involved in
sending it to theop cluster on
EMR phosphere Studio allows you to use
any existing job flow running in your
AWS account you can also create one or
more templates for new job flows which
Define the parameters of the job flow
you want to start when you're ready to
deploy your job you can choose an
existing job flow or use any of your
predefined templates when you select the
job flow kosere Studio sends your Hadoop
job to elastic map ruce in the Amazon
Cloud once the job is running on the job
flow kosere studios's online cluster
capabilities provide graphical
monitoring profiling and debugging of
our map produced job you can graphically
monitor all the map produced jobs on a
job flow and Visually debug
them here you select a job and click on
the profile job button the summary tab
shows you the job name the cluster name
the job ID the input and output file or
directory and the time taken to complete
the job based on the Diagnostics given
you can improve or change your
code the timeline tab shows you the time
used in each phase of the task including
the time in map Shuffle and reduce
phases these are important to know when
tuning your your code the graphs are
interactive and clicking on them shows
the attempts for each map and reduced
task the counters tab shows us all the
Hadoop counters such as count of records
as important debugging AIDS General
Hadoop and job specific counters are
easily
accessible the Diagnostics tab displays
diagnostic rules the description of the
rule including importance description
and Diagnostics if a rule triggers then
advice is given the logs tab shows the
logs including STD out STD error and CIS
logs which are easy to access and help
you discover Java
exceptions the task tab shows
information on completed task including
start and finish times and logs for each
task including counters and
attempts finally the configuration tabs
gives you information about the Hado
parameters of the cluster and job from
the Hadoop configuration
file if you want to use map Produce job
outside of kosere Studio to for example
automate its regular deployment to the
cluster you can package and Export it
easily using the simple interface you
see
here in summary you have seen how to use
kosere studio with Amazon elastic map
reduce to simplify development of map
reduced jobs for EMR kosere Studio
increases the productivity of developers
saving time and effort its visual
interface enables a full spectrum of
developers to take advantage of elastic
map
reduce in addition to standard licensing
kosere studio is available under the
same pay as you go hourly pricing model
as EMR providing a low cost of Entry to
Hadoop development and a single payment
process from Amazon thank you for
watching this video for more information
about Amazon elastic map produce in
kosere studio please go to kare.com or
send email to sales atmosphere.
